resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Lets see what we have changed recently in ROM
Visit our G+ page for support and news

List of supported devices and their official maintainers

☀ Founder 
☀ Project leader 
☀ Head Developer 
☀ Maintainer

ColtOS was started by me (Rakesh Batra), Nitin, Nikhil and Debojit in early 2017 and it was a small but an effective group also and we all were in learning stage that\'s why Colt as a name arrived means a Learner. To start with ColtOS was based on LOS but now we have moved to aosp base and now in ColtOS Team we still have a team with some new members also and is just like a family to me, i would still like to mention the name of each and every member in ColtOS Team, 1. Rakesh Batra 2. Nitinkumar Chobhe 3. Roger.T 4.Debojit Deb, 5. Vinoth, 6. Santosh (SuperdroidBond), 7. Mukesh, 8. Athul, 9. Nikhil, 10. Meet Gohil, 11. Saurabh Hooda and 12. Anupam D Moran, that\'s the wonderfull team we have!!
Where the main source code for ColtOS is located
Come on over and follow us there!
This public group is for feedback, reviews and testing for ColtOS builds
Lead developer and Founder of ColtOS, also Builds for OnePlus 3/3T
Co developer and Builds for Mako and Shamu. Often motivate Rakesh Batra to keep things simple :P
Co developer and really contributed well in Oreo and also Builds for Yu Yureka

The man to thank for amazing work for ColtOS whether it is boot animation, icons, wallpapers! He has a LOT to offer - all while completely ignoring the natural need for sleep. Hopefully he stays put;)
Builds for OnePlus5/5T and such a nice human being.
Builds for OnePlus3/3T, also help in adding features in the ROM and such a nice human being.
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Browse and select installed colt themes (Thanks to Omni)
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
This options are only meant to work with old rcents(Oreo recents). Please remove Quickstep to Enjoy these tweaks.
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Display a notification when android debugging is enabled
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Hide Left-Right Shortcuts on secure lock screens
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Delay until long press action starts
Trigger back gesture on landscape from
Back gesture must start below this percentage of the screen
Show animated feedback on edges when back gesture is used
Blink flashlight only in ringer mode
Blink flashlight only in DND mode
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Use bottom swipe up gestures for navigation

Navigation bar must be disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Last app
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Heigth from bottom to trigger swipe
Timeout before the gesture action is started
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
Control how the device network should behave when the screen is off
Enable Disable Ram bar in recent app view
Enable / disable custom styling of recent apps view
Enable / disable rotation of clear all button
Vibrate clear all button on press
Enable / disable haptic feedback of dismiss all button
Longpress updates memory bar if present
Immersive recents setting is overridden if the expanded desktop is enabled.
Change the view of the recents screen
Shows clock at the top while in immersive
Shows date at the top while in immersive
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Show buttons to increase or decrease the brightness
Change volume panel from right side to left side
Show indicators when Wi-Fi is sending/receiving data like mobile
Display the number of pending notifications
Enable to display logo in the status bar
When enabled the statusbar will be hidden on lockscreen
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Show the clock widget on the lockscreen
Show the date, weather, alarms and zen on the lockscreen
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Use a preset color instead of the generated color
Enable to show battery percent while dozing
Customize elements to be displayed in power menu
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Shows some spectrum bars reacting to the music you\'re listening (works with most audio apps)
Trigger an action when the screen is off
Select an app to launch with the squeeze action
Not all squeeze actions within Active Edge have the capability to activate the display
Show LS Visualizer on Ambient Display
Shows the visualization bars also on ambient display (but less opaque)
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
This is test for selected toast animation
Customize the animations of each window in system
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
Show heads up only for dialer app and disable all others
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Custom Ambient Display Configuration for ColtOS
For better visibility on bright images
Select a local or remote image
Customize clock and date in statusbar
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
